C

clear() - Method in interface org.jtrim2.cache.VolatileReference
Removes the referenced object from this volatile reference.
clearCache() - Method in class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Removes every cached reference from this cache.
createHardReference(T) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.cache.GenericReference
Returns a volatile reference that stores a hard reference to the specified object.
createReference(T, ReferenceType) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.cache.GenericReference
Returns a volatile reference of the passed object that is directly backed by the JVM.
createSoftReference(T) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.cache.GenericReference
Returns a volatile reference which stores a soft reference to the specified object.
createWeakReference(T) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.cache.GenericReference
Returns a volatile reference which stores a weak reference to the specified object.

G

GenericReference - Class in org.jtrim2.cache
Contains static methods to create volatile references backed by the JVM.
get() - Method in interface org.jtrim2.cache.VolatileReference
Returns the referenced object or null in case it disappeared.
getApproxMemorySize() - Method in interface org.jtrim2.cache.MemoryHeavyObject
Returns the approximate size of memory in bytes retained by this objects.
getCurrentSize() - Method in class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Returns the cumulative size of the currently cached objects.
getMaximumCacheSize() - Method in class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Returns the maximum allowed cumulative size of the cached objects.
getMaximumObjectsToCache() - Method in class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Returns the maximum number of cached objects allowed in this cache concurrently.
getNoReference() - Static method in class org.jtrim2.cache.GenericReference
Returns a volatile reference which always returns null.
getReference(V, ReferenceType) - Method in class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Returns a new volatile cached reference of the given object.
getReference(V, ReferenceType) - Method in interface org.jtrim2.cache.ObjectCache
Returns a new volatile cached reference of the given object.

J

javaRefCache() - Static method in interface org.jtrim2.cache.ObjectCache
Returns an ObjectCache implementation which is directly backed by the JVM.

M

MemoryHeavyObject - Interface in org.jtrim2.cache
An interface for objects retaining considerable amount of memory.
MemorySensitiveCache - Class in org.jtrim2.cache
A cache implementation which limits the maximum cumulative size of the objects stored.
MemorySensitiveCache(long) - Constructor for class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Initializes an empty cache with the given maximum cumulative size of cached objects.
MemorySensitiveCache(long, int) - Constructor for class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Initializes an empty cache with the given maximum number and maximum cumulative size of cached objects.

O

ObjectCache - Interface in org.jtrim2.cache
Defines a cache of some java objects.
org.jtrim2.cache - package org.jtrim2.cache
Contains classes for caching Java objects.

R

ReferenceType - Enum in org.jtrim2.cache
The type of references to be used by ObjectCache implementations for volatile references when the referenced object is not in the cache.

T

toString() - Method in class org.jtrim2.cache.MemorySensitiveCache
Returns the string representation of this cache in no particular format.

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum org.jtrim2.cache.ReferenceType
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum org.jtrim2.cache.ReferenceType
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
VolatileReference<ReferentType> - Interface in org.jtrim2.cache
Defines a reference to an object which can disappear any time beyond the control of the client.
